import {postDetailType} from "../../../../utils/types/types"; import like from '../../../../assets/icons/Post/like.svg' import chat from '../../../../assets/icons/Post/chat.svg' import repost from '../../../../assets/icons/Post/repost.svg' import share from '../../../../assets/icons/Post/share.svg' import more from '../../../../assets/icons/Post/more-horizontal.svg' type Props = { postDetail: postDetailType; }; export const PostDetailContent: React.FC = ({postDetail}) => { return ( <>

{postDetail.author.name}

{postDetail.date}

{postDetail.images?.map((img, index) => )}

{postDetail.text}

); };
